backend/main.mo: Defines production and draft website text and exposes a publish function that copies the draft into production after validation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a draft‑to‑production deployment feature to relevant frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and role of various frontend files in the Valentine's Day app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme variables and dark mode overrides defining color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring all Valentine sections and conditionally showing the PublishDraftBar in admin mode.
frontend/src/components/admin/PublishDra: Admin banner with a publish button that calls the backend publish function and shows success or error status.
frontend/src/components/valentine/CardSu: Reusable card container applying padding and optional hover‑lift styling.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Closin: Closing section with quote, Valentine message, and fade‑in animation.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Footer: Footer showing copyright and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/valentine/HeroSe: Hero area with animated hearts, main title, and entry fade‑in animation.
frontend/src/components/valentine/LoveLe: Editable love‑letter section with preview/edit toggle and clipboard copy support.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Memori: Manages a grid of editable memory cards with add, update, and delete actions.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Memory: Editable memory card with title, description, image paste support, and update/delete actions.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Reason: Manages and displays a list of customizable reasons with icons, including add, edit, delete, and icon cycling.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Sectio: Wrapper component that applies themed background and pattern styling to content sections.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminTokenFromHash: Extracts and tracks an admin token from the URL hash, updating on hash changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useClipboardCopy.ts: Provides a helper to copy text to the clipboard with success/error status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for handling Internet Identity login, persistence, and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useInViewFade.ts: Tracks whether an element is in view using IntersectionObserver for fade-in animations.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Stub returning empty queries since backend logic is local or handled elsewhere.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining Valentine-themed palettes, typography, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the app.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins including container queries and animate support.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, including schema version, known issues, and an existing feature request related to deploying latest drafts to production.
